member.name: ID2D1ComputeInfo.SetComputeShader
member.summary: Sets the compute shader to the given shader resource. The resource must be loaded before this call is made.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1ComputeInfo.SetComputeShaderConstantBuffer
member.summary: Establishes or changes the constant buffer data for this transform.
member.param: The data applied to the constant buffer.
The number of bytes of data in the constant buffer.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1ComputeInfo.SetResourceTexture
member.summary: Sets the resource texture corresponding to the given shader texture index to the given texture resource. The texture resource must already have been loaded with method. This call will fail if the specified index overlaps with any input. The input indices always precede the texture LUT indices.
member.param: The index to set the resource texture on.
The resource texture object to set on the shader texture index.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.

member.name: ID2D1ComputeInfo
member.summary: Enables specification of information for a compute-shader rendering pass.
